snippet: The list includes American public companies with a market capitalization of at least $1 billion that filed proxy statements by April 30 of this year.
abstract: Methodology for calculating 200 highest-paid American chief executives is provided.
lead_paragraph: The list includes American public companies with a market capitalization of at least $1 billion that filed proxy statements by April 30 of this year.

headline.main: How the Chief Executives’ Pay Figures Were Calculated
headline.print_headline: How the Chief Executives’ Pay Figures Were Calculated
